commit_list.message: Adding new redis cluster for dev server.
Adding instrumentation to http requests for New Relic.
Commenting out New Relic reporting until we can compile it correctly on EC2.
Commenting out New Relic reporting until we can compile it correctly on EC2.
Moved settings into configuration files, which can be specified when running make.
Adding simple echo handler for websocket client testing.
Adding response code to headers to make error codes accessible from Unity.
Modifying test receipt for testing failures.
Changed receipt verification to respond with error codes for invalid receipt data.
Moving test scripts and data to tests folder
Reverting Mac specific changes to erlang.mk
Initial implementation of receipt verification endpoint.
Initial commit with Direct3D 10 support, and initial window setup.'
Switching version of c99sh. Minor emacs fixes.
Minor cleanup to emacs config. Changed default font.
Fixing rust install errors on linux.
Adding Raspberry Pi and Android stdlibs for update-rust-mobile
Easier binding for direx, disabled audible bell.
Utility script to update nightly rust along with stdlibs for iOS.
Project tree sidebar addition + helper functions.
Added script to update stdlibs for rust mobile platforms.
Ditching oh-my-fish for bare bones fish config.
Adding aliases for git under fish.
Some cleanup, added Mac utility for taking normal sized screenshots.
Cleaning up gitconfig. Switching core editor to Atom.
Fixing paths to .dotfiles. Removing cruft. Added utility for listing all C/C++/ObjC++ source files in a directory.
Added cool beans file renaming shortcuts (zmv)
Some additions to zshrc for screen.
Additions to oh-my-zsh plugins, more changes.
Added shortcut to open a new instance of Xamarin on Mac
Adding new entries to path. Adding handy symbolicate alias for symbolicating iOS crash dumps using dSYM.
Adding git sync command for quickly updating several repositories at once.
Adding hooks for direnv, alias for youtube-dl downloads 'yt'.
Adding settings for Go, installed from Homebrew.
Fixing gyp-mode to work with built-in python-mode.
Adding some initial emacs configs, based on Prelude.
Changed editor to Sublime Text. Added sync githelper.
Added helper script for setting g up references to dot files.
Adding additional bundles and configuration to vimrc and zshrc
Initial commit. Cleanup from old dotfiles.
Day two complete! now with awesome artwork, evil birds and lawn darts!

Ludum Dare 23 Day 1 Complete!
- Initial player movement and sprite control
- Basic projectile implementation
- Tilemap loading and rendering
Cleanup, and added math definitions file.
Got Win32 version compiling with tundra.
Enable embedding projects in another solution.
Fixed target dir for xcode projects.
Adding C++11 to objc compiler options.
Restructuring build to make xplat easier.
Fixing check for result of getaddrinfo.
Improved debug logging for http parsing.
WIP HTTP client. Still working out processing.
socket_recv not returns the bytes recieved.
Removing extra allocation from test. Separated implementation out for ip_address functions.
Fixed port socket_bind and other socket tests.
Stubs for socket functionality to be implemented.
Swapping our allocator static interface for the STL version.
Added logging support with configurable log output level.
Default allocator can now be specified with nullptr.
Allowing allocator copy/assignment. Fixing allocation in strdup.
Added allocator concept with support for malloc and memory pool allocations.
Add support for running unit tests on Wercker.
Adding dependencies for header files. Moving thirdparty -> external.
Fixed SpriteBatch shaders for GL, and OpenGL implementation.
Added linear interpolation method to Vector.
Added support for alpha blended sprites.
Fixing defaults. Re-enabling temporary state objects.
Trying to get OpenGL running again on Mac.
Finished Shader abstraction. Added resource activation via RenderDevice. Chipping away at cross-platform SpriteBatch.
Moved VertexPositionColorTexture to standard vertex formats header.
Implemented updateable textures. Hacky partial implementation of Awesomium rendering.
Fixed math tests on Mac. Minor formatting fixes.
Matrix rotation, translation and scaling generation with unit tests.
Added loading for float3, improved dot product tests.
Adding store testing to vector load tests.
Fixed bug in vector loading code when using four individual scalar values.
Adding unit tests for current Vector math implementation.

Fixing Mac build.

Runtime errors and porting of SpriteBatch still to be done.
Adding Mac build of Skia for experiments.
Initial Matrix math. Some light cleanup.
Adding files for standard FPU implementation of Vector.
Cleaning up Vector code, starting on Matrix implementation.
Backing up partial work to components.
Initial SpriteBatch implementation. Still pretty hacky. Needs engine support for lots of things before it's cross-platform.
Replacing Flex and Bison with Antlr.
Tools and placeholder grammars for Material format.
Restructuring project layout to minimize build definitions to one project per file. Adding jansson for JSON parsing in Engine.
Changed API for creating buffers to allow for optional initial data.
Added update method to index/vertex buffers.
Initial input support for XInput controllers, basic keyboard support, basic mouse support.
Added delegates; accessor methods for gamepad properties.
Filtering out RDP defined devices in RawInput enumeration method.
Moving platform includes into precompiled headers.
Catching up D3D11 Index and Vertex Buffer up with OpenGL.
Implemented D3D11 RenderDevice. Added exception handling for RenderDevice creation.
API cleanup. Fixed memory issue with Win32 Window implementation.
Hack to fix a warning in the assert macro.
Cleaning out old platform abstraction method and replacing it with a much simpler one.
Migrated to new build script. Fixed assertion handler. Started on GLIndexBuffer and GLVertexBuffer.
Consolidating code generation settings. Added option to force file regeneration, even if their definitions haven't been touched.
Adding default constructor values for fields.
Code generation fixes for pointer types. Added several graphics enum types.
Working code generation for Window and RenderDevice.
Moving glew folder to the appropriate location.
Adding Glew to externals for OpenGL extension lookup.
Skeleton layout for RenderDevice with (minor) OpenGL support. Empty implementation of MacWindow.
Added base class typedef to generated files.
Added tool for generating platform abstraction boilerplate code.
Added delegate class with support for multiple listeners and lamba function support. Revamping cross-platform support class structure, first with Window implementation.
Added a command line override for the sys_config setting.
